content.raw: Just want to get a quick note in - this seems to make it really long; potentially infinite.  I'm trying to probe this further, but I had a world where I had 'beamed' to another checkpoint, and this detection never triggered.  I hadn't thought of this commit, so I didn't give it hours and hours, and I will try to probe this a bit further.  But if you haven't frozen 0.6, you might wait a hair...
